title: Neo PAX Sivir Ways to get her?
body: I know that you can get Neo PAX Sivir trough normal chests, 10 Gemstones and with Epic Capsules that has increased chance to drop it. But I want to know will you can get her re-rolling 3 skin shards over and over till you get it. Thanks

replies.body: sneaky rerolled neo pax sivir so ye it works
So can we get her using 3 skin shard while re-rolling?

I'm not *quite* 100% sure, due to this skin being slightly different than the previous ones, but most have been able to be gained by rerolling shards. I do believe you'll be able to get her by rerolling, but we'll need to wait for the official word once she's released.
